Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory217.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Do you know how to fish, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While doing mission work in the snow, Rosetta suddenly throws a question at you.'}
{2: 'Kinda sorta.', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Kinda sorta...? Which means you should learn how to properly fish. Grab your fishing pole, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "We've had a few mishaps so far, but at least we managed to start a fire and set up camp.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Next up, time to learn about how to secure food.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Can't we just eat rations?", 3: '14', 4: 'So we need to fish?', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That's not really in accordance with nature. Plus, fresh fish is loads better than the rations from Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yup. The Forest Guards live in accordance with nature, so fishing is one of the ways we do that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I have all the necessary tools ready this time. Commandant, we just need to find a good place to fish.', 4: '1'}
{3: '30 minutes later—'}
{2: 'Any bites, Rosetta?', 3: '23', 4: '(Feeling a little tired...)', 5: '23'}
{3: "Rosetta's silence speaks louder than words. The fishing bucket is sloshing around in the liveliness of pure sea water."}
{3: 'In other words, not so much as a nibble.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Today's not my lucky day... Can't help it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if taking a blow to her heart, Rosetta picks up a rock and hurls it after a long exasperated sigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Special summon!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Instantly, you realize Rosetta's nefarious plans. However, you are helpless in stopping the tragedy from unfolding."}
{3: 'The special-summon rock skips for over twenty times before sinking into the sea.'}
{3: 'Silence fills the air, then compresses into tension. Rosetta fixes her eyes on the shore, waiting for the fated arrival.'}
{3: 'But her expectant gaze is only met with the reticent and gentle waves of the sea. The watery ritual did not summon the furry bionic; the air is absent of his signature roar.'}
{3: 'Which is to be expected. After all, even coincidences have its limits.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Oh. Just saw you two from afar and decided to come ashore early.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Why do you look so surprised? No, wait! The last two rocks might have been accidents, but this time, you're definitely tryna land it!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Well... I only know how to summon you this way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'So you want me to help catch fish this time, aye?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah. No bites so far, no choice but to catch fish directly. But Commandant does not have diving gear, and I'm also not built for underwater operations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Think you could help out? We're about done for today, so I want the commandant to have a taste of the Arctic flavor if possible.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Yeah, yeah... Y'know, you rocky horrorshow kinda rubs me the wrong way, but seeing you here with an empty bucket all day does make me feel kinda sorry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Alright then, I'll give you some of my fish.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You'll give us fish?", 3: '58', 4: 'Thanks.', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'What? Got a problem with that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I think Commandant is wondering why you\'re "giving" us fish, instead of catching.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Pah. Then I'll have to get my fur all wet again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Pfffah, just be grateful is all.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, the bionic bear opens up his tummy and a refrigerator compartment appears before your eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...You have a fridge for your belly? You bionics are just like Swiss Army knives, aren't you?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "There's like ten other functions or so, which are all highly practical. Alright! How about a roast fish for the human right here on the spot? You can trust your bear's grill!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The bear treats you to a delicious dinner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's already night, huh... I went fishing some more after that, but no luck.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You'll get a bite eventually.", 3: '77', 4: "Let's just have the bear help next time as well.", 5: '78'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll keep trying, but it seems like fishing still takes luck after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah. If we still can't get any bites, let's do so.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Rosetta looks up at the sky.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Only one last area to survey...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Just... my lucky day.', 4: '1'}
